description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Catskill Mountains and the region around ... Their scenery, legends and history; with sketches in prose and verse, by Cooper, Irving, Bryant, Cole and others ... Revised edition" Author: ROCKWELL, Charles. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.bb.24." Page: 40 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1867 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003129137 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
